title: Environmental certifications (Energy Star, LEED, carbon neutral)
dataVerified: Building owner, facility manager, auditor name, certification type, certification level, issue date, expiration date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Displayed certificates in buildings benefit from human readability for visitors and tenants. Domain binding verifies legitimate certifier (Energy Star, LEED, etc.). Prevents fake environmental claims for greenwashing. Critical for commercial real estate where environmental certifications impact property value and tenant attraction.
